paper_abstract: In this paper we present a parameterized algorithm that solves the Convex Recoloring problem for trees in O(256(k) (*) poly(n)). This improves the currently best upper bound of O(k(k/log k)(k) (*) poly(n)) achieved by Moran and Snir. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A 2(O(k))poly(n) algorithm for the parameterized Convex Recoloring problem
